com.xtend.coap.resource

Class Resource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xtend.coap.resource.Resource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RequestHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocalResource

    public class Resource
extends java.lang.Object
implements RequestHandler
    Class that represents a Resource.
    Version:
    Xtend-CoAP_v1.0.
    Author:
    César Estebas Gómez.
